channel.title: Possible signlink problem
channel.description: Hello, Basically, when I try to download the cache for my client it'll download the cache then extract the cache into a sub-folder called 'NobleCache' but I have set it to download the .zip file into Insanity-Pkz in the c: drive then extract itself into that folder. I'm completely confused to why its making a sub-folder inside of the Insanity-Pkz folder called NobleCache and storing the data in that file. I feel that I haven't done anything wrong and whenever I search Noble / NobleCache nothing comes up. http://dl.dropbox.com/u/68059584/Client.zip A link to my client(cache will auto download via the cachedownloader). Thank you in advance.

item.title: Possible signlink problem
item.dc:creator: @Kidpaparoach Kidpaparoach
item.description:
@Kidpaparoach wrote:

Hello,
Basically, when I try to download the cache for my client it’ll download the cache then extract the cache into a sub-folder called ‘NobleCache’ but I have set it to download the .zip file into Insanity-Pkz in the c: drive then extract itself into that folder.
I’m completely confused to why its making a sub-folder inside of the Insanity-Pkz folder called NobleCache and storing the data in that file. I feel that I haven’t done anything wrong and whenever I search Noble / NobleCache nothing comes up.
http://dl.dropbox.com/u/68059584/Client.zip A link to my client(cache will auto download via the cachedownloader).
Thank you in advance.

Read full topic
